  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205391</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Art of Interpretation: A.C.T.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die kunst der Deutung: A.C.T.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'art de la traduction : A.C.T.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A arte da interpretação: A.C.T.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arte dell'interpretazione: A.C.T.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η τέχνη της ερμηνείας: A.C.T.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El arte de la interpretación: A.C.T.</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">SPARK goes backstage at the American Conservatory Theatre (ACT), as Artistic Director Carey Perloff takes on one of the 20th century's most important and challenging plays �?? Samuel Beckett's "Waiting for Godot." This Educator Guide explores Beckett's work and absurdism in literature.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">FUNKEN geht Bühne hinter dem Vorhang am amerikanischen 
Conservatory-Theater (TAT), da künstlerischer Direktor Carey Perloff 
auf einem des 20. Jahrhunderts am wichtigsten und der schwierigen 
Spiele?? nimmt? Samuel Becketts "WarteGodot." Diese 
Erzieher-Anleitung erforscht Arbeit und absurdism Becketts in der 
Literatur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'ÉTINCELLE s'attaque à l'arrière plan au théâtre 
américain de conservatoire (LOI), car directeur artistique Carey 
Perloff prend un du 20ème siècle le plus important et de jeux 
provocants ? ? ? Godot d'attente de Samuel Beckett "." Ce 
guide d'éducateur explore le travail et l'absurdism de Beckett en 
littérature.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A FAÍSCA vai backstage no theatre americano do 
conservatório (ATO), porque o diretor artístico Carey Perloff faz 
exame em um do 20o século o mais importante e de jogos challenging???
Godot de espera de Samuel Beckett "." Esta guia do 
educador explora o trabalho e o absurdism de Beckett na literatura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La SCINTILLA va backstage al teatro americano del 
conservatory (LEGGE), poichè il direttore artistico Carey Perloff 
intraprende uno del ventesimo secolo più importante e dei giochi 
challenging??? Godot attendente di Samuel Beckett "." 
Questa guida dell'educatore esplora il lavoro ed il absurdism 
del Beckett in letteratura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο ΣΠΙΝΘΗΡΑΣ πηγαίνει παρασκήνια στο αμερικανικό 
συντηρητικό θέατρο (ΝΟΜΟΣ), καθώς ο καλλιτεχνικός σκηνοθέτης 
Carey Perloff παίρνει ένας από του 20ού αιώνα του 
σημαντικότερου και που προκαλεί παίζει αναμονή $λ* Samuel 
Beckett's τη "για Godot." Αυτός ο οδηγός εκπαιδευτικών 
ερευνά την εργασία και το absurdism Beckett στη λογοτεχνία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿La CHISPA va entre bastidores en el teatro americano del 
invernadero (ACTO), pues director artístico Carey Perloff toma en uno
del vigésimo siglo más importante y de juegos desafiadores??? 
Godot que espera de Samuel Beckett "para." Esta guía del 
educador explora el trabajo y el absurdism de Beckett en literatura.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
